channel.title: <Graphical bug> Health & armor chargers
channel.description:
All health & armor charge station have a small graphical glitch: during the charge process, "liquid" disappears not as smooth as it does in MOD version.
This happens with every health & armor charge stations in the game, both in SP and MP versions.

item.title: <Graphical bug> Health & armor chargers
item.dc:creator: sourcegamer101
item.description:
The choppy charger liquid bug is happening to me too

Read full topic

item.title: <Graphical bug> Health & armor chargers
item.dc:creator: sprd_trion
item.description:
striker:

I have a related issue. Chargers do not work for me. No depletion animation plays and my stats don’t go up.

AFAIK, this is a known issue related to the latest content patch.
Unfortunately, the only way to fix it is to start a completely new game.

Read full topic
